title: Email Dates
content: Something happened to our Thunderbird, we had always viewed our newest emails when we "open". Now we view the oldest first and we can't even find the newest. Can you help us please?
creator: bill328

title: Updating server setting in Thunderbird reverts with restart
content:
I'm trying to update the server settings for an email address in Thunderbird, but it reverts to the old settings when Thunderbird restarts.

I go to the account settings for the email address of interest. I then update the Server Name or the User name (they both do the same thing). This then produces a pop-up that says "Restart is required to apply the server name or username change." Click OK to restart and when Thunderbird has restarted the Server Name/User Name has reverted back to the old setting.

A similar thing happens if I try and make the matching changes to the outgoing SMTP settings. They appear to change until Thunderbird restarts at which point the old settings have been restored.

I needed to make this change to two PC's. One PC (a windows 11 PC) worked fine. The other (a windows 10 PC) consistently fails. The affected PC is using the latest Thunderbird ver 115.5.1.

What am I missing here? Why can't we change the Server settings?
creator: ian208

title: Unable to download my emails to Thunderbird client on my laptop
content:
Dear Sir/Madam:

I am following your instructions per email from Mozilla Support on Thursday, Nov 23, 2023 sent by Manuel).

I am sending you this request for help since I am unable again to download (pop) my email messages to Thunderbird client on my laptop. I have done nothing to cause this. It happened suddenly today. Last time it happened was on Nov 16: I could not download my emails for over ten days. Then suddenly it downloaded all messages from Nov 16 until today. BUT it stopped downloading again today at 12:52 pm eastern time. Obviously there is a problem with Thunderbird and I desperately need your help. Please check my account and tell me what to do. Why is this happening. I talked to Yahoo Small Business support, they check everything but they determined that the problem is with Thunderbird and they asked me to contact you. I did that when the problem happened on Nov 16. I did not get any support from you then. I hope you will help me this time, please. Do not ask me to resubmit the question again since you already have my question and I followed the steps you gave me.

There might be some suspicious activities that are causing this problem. Please check this. On both days the interruption happened (Nov 16 and today Nov 30), I received multiple emails with the following content. Clearly, these are all suspicious emails. Today I received 7 such messages between 3:44 pm and 4:18 pm. The message says:

=============================

Subject: REMINDER!!! Scheduled Storage Maintenance

November 30, 2023 From: abc@abctechnolab.com To: smari@arys.org

Thu, Nov 30 at 4:18 PM

Email Storage Update Dear Smari,

Your emaiI storage is scheduled for Maintenance today November 30, 2023. You wiII have to verify and confirm your emaiI to compIete the Storage Restore, or your account wiII be suspended/terminated within 24 hours in efforts to reduce congestion.


Restore Storage

=================

I do not believe you sent me these messages and Yahoo Small business did not send these messages either. Someone else did. I suspect these are phishing or scam type attempts. The only difference in the 7 messages sent today was the "From: ", the body of the messages is the same.


November 30, 2023 From: info@ironandvelvet.co.uk To: smari@arys.org

November 30, 2023 From: collectorsfest@cnypromotions.com To: smari@arys.org

November 30, 2023 From: contactus@printland.in To: smari@arys.org

November 30, 2023 From: sales@wellworthwireropes.com To: smari@arys.org

November 30, 2023 From: sales@wellworthwireropes.com To: smari@arys.org

November 30, 2023 From: dealers@hplctechnologies.com To: smari@arys.org

Again, the problem is that I cannot download my emails at all. When I click on Get New Messages for smari@arys.org from the Thunderbird File menu, I get the following message is displayed repeatedly: Error with account smari@arys.org. The account smari@arys.org is being processed. Please wait until processing is complete to get messages. Although there are no processing going on.

Yahoo Small Business support tried to help but they said the problem is with the Thunderbird side and asked me to contact you. Please check this and let me know if I can do anything to fix this problem once and for all. Thank you.

Waleed W. Smari smari@arys.org [removed phone# from public]
creator: waleed.smari

title: Problem with filters on Thunderbird
content:
I updated several filters on Thunderbird and my account went "crazy" and moved All mail out of my inbox. After digging for a while I found that when I added a filter on a domain (domain ends with) I accidentally added another line that had a blank (or null) entry. This seemed to match every message and lots of messages were moved. Can you add code that deletes or ignores these entries?

Also trying to run this down in the filter log was irritating. Can you have an option to see most recent filter applications first. Would make it easier to debug. I can live with a large log taking a long time to load but having TO Page down hundreds of times is an issue. Another option would be Go to end

How do I recover and/or more specifically re-integrate the previous install into my current one?

title: Asunto: Problema con el formato HTML en Thunderbird - ¿Puedo compartir el código?
content:
Hola comunidad de Mozilla,

Espero que todos estén teniendo un gran día. Recientemente, he estado experimentando un problema al enviar correos desde Mozilla Thunderbird en formato HTML. A pesar de que lo redacto y envío correctamente, el destinatario lo recibe como texto sin formato y las imágenes aparecen fuera de lugar.

Me preguntaba si alguien más ha experimentado esto y si hay alguna solución conocida. Además, estoy dispuesto a compartir el código HTML que estoy utilizando para ver si alguien puede identificar algún problema en él.

Agradezco cualquier orientación o ayuda que puedan proporcionar.

¡Gracias!

title: Unable to import .ics file that was exported by thunderbird
content:
I tried to migrate my thunderbird-stored local calendar to another computer. Both machines are running Debian GNU/Linux 12 with Thunderbird 115.5.0 (64 bit).

I exported by right-clicking the calendar, selected 'Export Calendar...' and exported it to a .ics file.

To import I tried Menu - Tools - Import and Selected 'Import from a file', 'Import calendars' and get the error message "No importable items found in the file."

If I open the .ics file with gnome-calendar, it imports all events without issues.

So it seems Thunderbird cannot import ics files it previously exported.

What can be done to get the calendar imported?
creator: peter.ganzhorn

title: email receive & send problems on multiple accounts after automatic update
content:
Hi. Recently Thunderbird automatically updated(current version is 115.5.1 32bit) on my win 10 Pro 64bit (v22H2) desktop, and now most of my accounts have a problem. My GMAIL account is the only one that I can both receive and send mail from.

Both Outlook accounts can receive mail, but only one account can send. Both accounts have exactly the same imap & smtp settings. Both have Authentication set to normal password. The account that cannot send mail fails login, the popup window suggests this is a password problem, but no password I have works. (this includes 2 MS generated App passwords).

Most importantly, my main Yahoo account cannot send or receive mail. I will just focus on this one for the time being. The 2 error messages I get are:- 1. "Connection to server export.imap.mail.yahoo.com timed out" (after several minutes) 2. "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to outgoing server(SMTP) smtp.mail.yahoo.com timed out. Try again" (after several minutes).

Here are things I`ve tried.

Disabling the ipv6 setting using config editor as suggested here https://support.mozilla.org/gl/questions/1401034 Changing the timeout mailnews.tcptimeout with config editor as suggested here https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/1367042 Logged into my yahoo account through browser using email address and password. Deleted all app passwords for TB. Waited 24 hours. Logged back in to check changes had taken. Generated new app password, and took copy of it. Checked with yahoo that the spaces in the password should be removed. I deleted the Yahoo account from TB, and re-installed it, both with the automatic configuration TB uses, and the manual configuration method. Despite TB asking for a password (I supplied the newly generated Yahoo App password), there is no password for smtp, imap or OAth2 stored in the saved passwords within TB.

I have checked the imap & smtp settings against these https://help.yahoo.com/kb/manually-download-yahoo-emails-sln28681.html, and used OAuth on both incoming & outgoing. I have also tried these settings with Authentication set to normal password. I have tried these settings https://help.yahoo.com/kb/SLN4075.html with OAuth2, and with normal password.

I have previously temporarily turned off Avast free antivirus, as well as Win 10 firewall. Since there is activity on some of the accounts I`m assuming the problem is not this. I have also previously loaded windows in safe mode with networking, and that did not make a difference.

Outlook on my Android has no problems sending or receiving from any of these accounts. I can find no useful info on the net with regards to problems after updating, but refuse to believe I am the only one experiencing problems.

After 3 days I have run out of patience. I have exhausted information and options. Can somebody offer suggestions? Thanks in advance, Dave.
creator: YH_Soubriquet

title: Is it possible to use a shared Gmail inbox with Thunderbird?
content:
I tried to access a shared Gmail account via Thunderbird, let's say shared@gmail.com. I don't have a password for this account, but when I log in in the browser, Gmail knows it is a shared account and says "log in using another account" and then I can use personalmail@gmail.com to log in.

I tried this in Thunderbird by adding shared@gmail.com and then using personalmail@gmail.com as the OAuth2 option. I found some tutorials at university websites that use this, but all with Exchange and not Gmail. At first this didn't work; I got an "incoming server already exists" error. By using imap.googlemail.com I circumvented that and the account was added, but it showed the personalmail@gmail.com inbox, not the shared@gmail.com one.

Is there a way to make this work or is it simply not possible?

title: Getting duplicated messages with Outlook account
content:
Some messages get duplicated in my outlook.office365.com Inbox. They both have the same date, time and content.

Deleting them deletes only one of them while the other becomes an empty message marked as received on December 31st 1969 at 7:00 PM.

Quitting and restarting TB make the duplicate / empty message disappear.

While this duplication is not very frequent, maybe 1 in 50, the following behaviour is constant. This has never happened in my Gmail Inbox. The duplicates appear only in TB, not in the Outlook web client. I have been using TB since a week or two.

MacOS 14.1 / 14.1.2 TB 115.5.1

Thanks !
creator: yesyves

title: No importable items found when trying to import .ics file into new TB Profile
content:
One user's Thunderbird profile was acting strangely with settings reverting back to previous values, so I decided to build a new profile. I backed up their address book and calendar files to .ics files, then uninstalled Thunderbird, removed all registry entries, rebooted, installed a fresh copy of Thunderbird, imported address books then tried to import the calendar .ics file and each time I try to import the .ics file in the import screen a red bar appears as an error saying no importable items found in this file. I re-installed the same version of Thunderbird that was installed 102.15.1. This did not involve 115 at all.

I tried two different times with this user's calendars and it produces the same result. I tried exporting the calendars as .html files, but there's no option in the import wizard to choose that file format.

I also tried going to the user's old profile folder and into calendar-data and copying all of the files from there and copying them into the new profile folder, then re-launching Thunderbird but that also didn't work, nothing imported and the home calendar is blank.

I found one forum post suggesting importing the calendar .ics file into a google calendar then exporting it back down as a .ics then importing it to Thunderbird, but this user is not comfortable with that.

Does anyone else have a solution?
creator: cwensink

title: Archive is not working properly.
content:
Thunderbird 115.5.1 Windows 10 When I use the Archive Function in this latest edition of Thunderbird, it does not consistently put my emails where I specify in the settings. As far as I know, this only began occurring in this specific version of Thunderbird.

When an account setting is set to archive to Local Archive > Year by Month, it puts the file in a monthly folder in the Local, but!!! it does not put it into the Archive Folder. Nor does it put the Month folder under the specific year as Thunderbird had done in previous iterations.

But, when the account is set to Archive by Year but not by month, it actually does put it into that Year folder in the Archive folder.

I am pointing out an error in the programming of the Archive feature. If I try to manually move the month folder 2021-02 from Local to Local Archive, I get an error message that "A subfolder with the name already exists"

Is there anything that I can do to fix this on my end?

title: suggestions to make choosing text color easier
content:
Two suggestions: - In an earlier version of Tbird, it was faster to apply text colors to email. Currently, after choosing custom colors, one needs to click OK on two successive windows [headers: color, then text color].

Either of the following would be helpful: a) upon hitting OK on the first dialog [Color], automatically apply the selection - the user has finished the selection or b) allow a double-click to be a synonym for OK (on first dialog's OK, 2nd dialog's Choose a Color and Last Picked Color).

- Emulate something like Format painter: select text with desired color (and style + font), click format painter, when swiping new text apply that choice.

[FWIW, currently using 115 on Windows.]

Thanks to all for a great package!

Probabilmente stai usando IMAP, per cui quello che fai da una postazione viene sincronizzato con tutte le altre. In altre parole se hai cancellato le email dall'app Android o dalla webmail, queste vengono cancellate anche da Thunderbird.
